name: NextPlugins Woo VAT
author: NextPlugins

sections.description:
Adds VAT field to WooCommerce checkout and customer account.

Adds VAT filed to WooCommerce REST (wc/v1 and wc/v2) orders endpoint.

Customizable position in checkout and customer account form.

Installation:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to WooCommerce -> Settings -> VAT Field -> Enable -> Save

  • readme updates

1.0.1

  • Add PHP 5.3 requirement

1.0.0

  • First version.

short_description: Adds VAT field to WooCommerce checkout page.
description:
Adds VAT field to WooCommerce checkout and customer account.

Adds VAT filed to WooCommerce REST (wc/v1 and wc/v2) orders endpoint.

Customizable position in checkout and customer account form.

Installation:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to WooCommerce -> Settings -> VAT Field -> Enable -> Save
